title: The Witch and the Hundred Knight
description:
The Witch and The Hundred Knight (Ã©Â­â€Ã¥Â¥Â³Ã£ï¿½Â¨Ã§â„¢Â¾Ã©Â¨Å½Ã¥â€¦Âµ Majo to Hyakkihei?) is an action role-playing video game that was developed and published by Nippon Ichi Software exclusively for the PlayStation 3. It was originally scheduled for release in Japan on June 28, 2012, but was later pushed back to an indefinite 2013 release date, and was eventually released on July 25, 2013. The game was released in Europe on March 21, 2014, and in North America on March 25, 2014.

There is both a regular and limited edition version of the game. The limited edition comes with a 44-page hardcover visual book, a Metallia Nendoroid Petit figurine, and the gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s soundtrack on two discs.

___

Tested working on internal HDD on rebug 4.46 with Multiman.
When multiman says that the game wants firmware 4.53, tell it yes to change the requirement file, and go play.

After starting the game, you'll eventually get to a black screen with white "Now Loading" text on it. The game hasn't frozen, loading can just take several minutes, have patience.

___

Sorry, the artbook isn't included, since it would mean removing the pages from the binding, and I don't have the skill or tools required to do that properly.

The inside of the manual wasn't included, since it's all just generic boringness. No character art or bios or anything.
